entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
